title: ✦STUNNING 5Bed/4Bath 3 FLOOR apt avail.9/1 (Half Fee)
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 174186480', 'Rent: $5,600 / Month', 'Beds: 5', 'Bath: 4', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Pet: Negotiable', 'Parking:: off-street parking', 'STUNNING 5bed/4bath apartment available for lease 9/1 in the heart of Brighton.', 'ON BC BUS ROUTE.', 'Recently renovated single family 5 bed, 4 bath.', 'New plumbing, electrical, windows, HVAC systems, new kitchen and bathrooms, hardwood floors and hybrid hot water tank.', 'Stainless steel appliances, in unit free laundry in this single family home.', '3 LEVELS OF LIVING SPACE plus basement for storage.', 'Great location close to public transportation, Cleveland Circle, Commonwealth Ave, and a variety of restaurants and shops.', 'Off street parking available for rent.', 'Please call/email Chris to schedule a showing!', 'chrisg @ <URL>', '7812281766', 'Click the link below to search all of my available apartments!', 'https://ygl.is/chris-gemayel', 'Tram: B Sutherland Road (0.10 mi)', 'Bus: 86 Chestnut Hill Ave @ Englewood Ave (0.32 mi)', 'Bus: 501 Winship St @ Union St (0.47 mi)', 'Bus: Green Line D Shuttle Reservoir (0.37 mi)', 'Tram: C Englewood Avenue (0.25 mi)', 'Tram: D Reservoir (0.38 mi)', 'Bus: 65 Washington St @ Commonwealth Ave (0.33 mi)', 'Chris Gemayel', 'Phone: 781 228 1766', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC', '107 Brighton Avenue', 'Boston, MA 02134', "Not what you're looking for?", 'Message me anyways!', 'I have access to one of the largest apartment databases in Greater Boston and would love to help with your next home search!', "Search Boston's largest selection of apartments <URL>", 'Benjamin Apartments LLC makes a good faith effort to post accurate photographs and descriptions of the apartments listed for rent, but because the information is supplied by third parties and is not independently verified, we cannot always guarantee its accuracy.', 'Rental rates, listing information and availability are subject to error and change, and listed rates may be lower than actual rates due to incentives offered by landlords.', 'All apartments have a one month brokerage fee to be paid by renter unless otherwise noted.', 'Additionally, the apartment advertised may no longer be available for rent.', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC fully supports the principles of the Fair Housing Act and the Equal Opportunity Act.']
